mapper.select: SELECT mbr_id, mbr_cd, mbr_nm, mbr_pw, mbr_nicknm, mbr_telno, mbr_addr, mbr_daddr, mbr_zip, mbr_eml, mbr_birth, mbr_join_ymdt, mbr_mdfcn_ymdt, mbr_img FROM member WHERE mbr_cd=#{memberCode};
mapper.update: UPDATE member set mbr_nm = #{memberName}, mbr_nicknm = #{memberNickname}, mbr_telno = #{memberTelNo}, mbr_addr = #{memberAddress}, mbr_daddr = #{memberDAddress}, mbr_zip = #{memberZip}, mbr_eml = #{memberEmail}, mbr_birth = #{memberBirth}, mbr_mdfcn_ymdt = curdate() where mbr_cd= #{memberCode};
UPDATE member SET mbr_img = #{imagePath}, mbr_mdfcn_ymdt = NOW() WHERE mbr_cd = #{memberCode}
